titleStmt.title: Act discharging the vending of any goods, from Ostend, or any other town or port of the Spanish Neatherlands [sic], till they abide their fourty dayes tryal.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Evan Tyler, Printer to the King's most excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Royal arms at head of text; initial letter.
Signed at end: Pet. Wedderburne, Cls. Sti. Concilii.
Imperfect: stained with some loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
